A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pros: Great visuals. Luke was great. Kylo was amazing. Rey was great. Poe was great. Leia was great. BB-8 is unstoppable. Cons: I didn’t like the Finn and rose story line. I also felt like the pacing was off\, and they through to many new stuff at the audience. They didn’t flesh out characters as well. For a film over 2hr 30min it feels very short. It doesn’t feel as big as “The Force Awakens” The humor was off and to direct in some scenes. They should have kept Luke until episode 9. What are they gonna do with Leia? Carrie Fisher is dead in real life.
